trigger.match: Im Kessel ist schon ein fertiger Trank.

muclient.script: dskill_mix1="mimmu" dskill_mix2="mp" dskill_rit1="zelebriere immunitaet" dskill_rit2="zelebriere blumenkind" mp=0 function mpset(nmp) mp =nmp end function dskill_skill() if tonumber(mp)>=9000 then world.Execute(dskill_mix1) else world.Execute(dskill_mix2) end end function dskill_start() world.EnableTimer("ksp_timer", true) world.EnableTimer("dskill_skill", true) end function dskill_stop() world.EnableTimer("ksp_timer", false) world.EnableTimer("dskill_skill", false) end function dskill_skill2() if tonumber(mp)>=9000 then world.Execute(dskill_rit1) else world.Execute(dskill_rit2) end end
